posts.post_title: The Georgia Peach Ty Cobb T206 / Graded
posts.post_content:

[IMG]http://i1190.photobucket.com/albums/z445/Seaw0lf/Mobile%20Uploads/downsized_0317010826c.jpg[/IMG]
